Back to Franz Liszt

Franz Liszt

La Romanesca, S. 252b

c. 1852 · LW A14 · R. 91

[IMSLP]

This is an arrangement of a Spanish dance, which also exists in an earlier version (S. 252a). The work was formerly catalogued as S. 247, under the belief that the dance was of Italian origin.

Recommended editions

  • New Liszt Edition (Editio Musica Budapest) · II/4 · Z. A/B 12393 · Free Arrangements IV · ed. László Martos / Imre Mező / László Vikárius

Duration: 8'

Difficulty: 3.5
